PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Blockchain Analysis App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What is the blockchain analysis app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our blockchain analysis app is a powerful tool that lets you gain valuable insights from new blockchain data as it gets added to the chain. It monitors and analyzes incoming transactions, smart contract executions, and other on-chain activity in real-time.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What kind of analysis can it perform?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: The app can perform a wide range of analyses including tracking token transfers, identifying suspicious transactions, monitoring DeFi activity, auditing smart contracts, and visualizing on-chain data flows. Customizable analytics allow you to slice and dice the data based on your specific needs.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How is the app integrated with blockchains?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Our app connects directly to blockchain nodes, allowing it to process new blocks and transactions as soon as they are mined and added to the chain. Support for Ethereum, Bitcoin, and all major EVM and UtxO-based chains is built-in.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is the app suitable for enterprise use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely. The blockchain analysis app is designed with enterprises in mind. It offers robust data privacy, access controls, audit trails, and can be deployed on-premises or in the cloud. Enterprise support and training is also available.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our blockchain analysis platform
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Blockchain analytics involves parsing and analyzing data from blockchains to gain insights into transactions, addresses, smart contracts and more. Our platform provides powerful tools to monitor, track and visualize on-chain activity.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We currently support analysis for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and major EVM-compatible chains like Polygon, Avalanche, etc. More chains are added regularly based on demand.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How can I track specific addresses or transactions?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You can set up watchlists and alerts to monitor addresses, transactions, smart contracts and other on-chain entities of interest. Anomaly detection helps flag suspicious activity automatically.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I integrate blockchain data into my apps?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, we provide APIs and SDKs that allow you to query on-chain data and embed visualizations into your applications and workflows. This enables building blockchain-powered apps and services.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: What analysis capabilities do you offer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Our platform provides multi-chain support, real-time and historical transaction monitoring, forensics tools, DEX data, NFT analytics, smart contract monitoring and more. The capabilities are constantly expanding.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Stay up-to-date with the latest blockchain transactions and events as they happen with our powerful monitoring and analysis tools.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Gain valuable insights into blockchain data with our suite of data mining, pattern recognition, and predictive analytics features.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Easily connect our platform to your existing blockchain infrastructure and start analyzing new information right away.
